entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:35 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 11:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: E 19 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 60 near noon then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
